<style>

.training-overview {
  --primary-color: #00883A;
  --primary-light: rgba(43, 134, 75, 0.1);
  --text-dark: #333333;
  --text-light: #ffffff;
  --card-bg: #ffffff;
  --card-shadow: 0 4px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
  --transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

/*description text styles*/
.training-overview p{
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  color: #4a5568;
  line-height: 1.85;
  margin-top: 3rem;
}

.training-card h3 {
  color: var(--primary-color);
  margin-top: 0;
  margin-bottom:1rem;
  font-size: 1.3rem;
  text-align:center;
}

.training-card p {
  font-size: 0.98rem;
  margin-top:0;
  margin-bottom: 0.8rem;
  text-align:center;
}

/*cards section styling*/
.training-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(300px, 1fr));
  gap: 1.5rem;
  margin-top:4rem;
  padding: 2rem;
  background-color: #f9fcf9;
  border-radius: 15px;
}
.training-grid > div {
  flex: 1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}
.training-card {
  background-color: var(--card-bg);
  height:500px;
  border-radius: 30px;
  padding: 1.5rem;
  transition: transform 0.13s, box-shadow 0.13s;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  flex-grow: 1;
  overflow: hidden;
  cursor:pointer;
  box-shadow: var(--card-shadow);
}

.training-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px) scale(1.025);
  box-shadow:
    0 8px 16px rgba(86, 100, 83, 0.15),
    0 0 0 2px rgba(0, 136, 58, 0.12);
}

/*first card */
.content-container h5,
.training-img h5 {
  text-align: center;
  margin: 0 0 .5rem 0;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  color: var(--text-dark);
}
.training-content.training-one {
    display:flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: flex-start;
    overflow: hidden;
    height: 100%; 
}

.training-content.training-two {
    display:flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    overflow: hidden;
    height: 100%; 
}

.training-content.training-two img {
    height:320px;
    width:auto;
    object-fit: contain;
}

.training-content.training-one img{
    height:280px;
    width: auto;
    object-fit: contain;
}
/*third card*/
.training-content.training-three {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  width: 100%;
}
.training-content.training-three > div {
  flex: 1;
}
.training-content.training-three .content-container{
  border: 1px solid var(--primary-color);
  padding: 0.6rem;
  border-radius: 6px;
  background: #ffffff;
  width: 100%;
  text-align:center;
}
.training-arrow{
  text-align:center;
  font-size:1.1rem;
  color: var(--primary-color);
}
.training-osf {
  text-align: center;
}
.training-osf p{
  margin-top: 0;
}
.training-osf .osf-btn {
  background-color: var(--primary-color);
  color: #ffffff;
  border: none;
  padding: 0.55rem 1.2rem;
  border-radius: 8px;
  transition: all 0.3s;
  display:inline-block;
}

.training-osf.osf-btn:hover {
  background-color: #016b2fff
  transform: translateY(-2px) scale(1.02);
  box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(0, 136, 58, 0.25);
}

@media (max-width: 650px) {
  .training-grid {
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    flex: 1;
  }
}



</style>
